name: Geo-Logic
description:
Geo-Logic challenges the player to correctly identify minerals that various NPCs they encounter are going to be requesting for a variety of fantastical reasons. How you preform at your job will directly affect the people and world around you, driving the player to preform well and sneaking in geology lessons and knowledge to the player.

Use tools and your codex to correctly identify the minerals, filling in the info you discover into your codex.

Click on tools to equip and unequip, clicking on the mineral with tools will use them.

Other Controls:
0 - Change Mineral

Dialogue encounters:

1, 2, 3, 4 - Wizard
5, 6, 7, 8 - Captain
V, B, N, M - Fool
